title: Chamber Partnership Portal and Local Business Onboarding
Simplify Pricing Tiers and Remove Add-On System

details.current_limitations: Search only does basic keyword matching. No support for natural language queries or structured filter extraction.
details.quick_fix_plan: Implement regex-based parser for common patterns (salary, location, job type, etc) as a quick solution.
details.long_term_plan: Integrate LLM (OpenAI or local model) to extract intent and filters from natural language queries. Parsing can happen on frontend, backend, or both.
details.user_experience_issues: Users cannot search with natural language (e.g., 'jobs paying $20 or more per hour', 'remote frontend jobs in Austin'). No structured filter extraction.

subtasks.title: Document current search limitations and user pain points
Design regex patterns for salary, location, job type extraction
Implement regex-based parser and integrate with backend
Write unit tests for regex parser
Research LLM APIs and select integration approach
User acceptance testing with real-world queries
